docs.lead_paragraph: BAL HARBOUR, Fla., Dec. 3 -- The American Medical Association acted today to bar racial discrimination in local medical societies and to set up a system of enforcement.

headline.main: A. M. A. VOTE ENDS BARS TO NEGROES; Disciplinary Measures Are Possible for Violations

docs.abstract: AMA votes to bar local med socs from discrimination, sets up means that could lead to local groups ouster for continued violations; debate detailed
docs.snippet: BAL HARBOUR, Fla., Dec. 3 -- The American Medical Association acted today to bar racial discrimination in local medical societies and to set up a system of enforcement.
